back.title: Encounters & Notes
back.subtitle: Ruled back page for encounters, factions, and reminders.
back.allies: Trismegistus press crew, Riverwatch scouts, friendly printer techs.
back.risks: Moisture warp, long-edge flip errors, expired toner streaks.
back.reminders: Lock scaling to 100%, orient pages consistently, let ink dry before stacking.
back.footer: Use the trim lines to confirm front/back alignment.

front.title: Ithril Scout
front.label: Front
front.body: Skilled pathfinder adept at sniffing out danger before it reaches the party.
front.footer: Keen Hearing and Smell | Advantage on Perception checks based on scent

front.title: Fane Scholar
front.label: Front
front.body: Keeps meticulous notes and provides lore snippets drawn from ancient catacombs.
front.footer: Arcana +5 | Translate runes and sigils during downtime

front.title: Runeseal
front.label: Front
front.body: Anchor an unstable portal until end of turn; spell ends if you move or take damage.
front.footer: 1 action | Concentration | Glyphs light faintly when active

front.title: Copperback
front.label: Front
front.body: Armoured tortoise used to haul gear across shifting dunes.
front.footer: AC 15 | Speed 25 ft | Carrying capacity 420 lb

front.title: Spell Tag
front.label: Front
front.body: Thin copper tag that stores a minor cantrip for one later cast.
front.footer: Single use | Imbue during a short rest

front.title: Press Master
front.label: Front
front.body: Verifies that the preview matches printed output before production runs.
front.footer: Checklist ready | Calipers set | Front alignment locked

front.title: Courier Raven
front.label: Front
front.body: Takes short messages between nearby settlements without attracting attention.
front.footer: Speed 60 ft (fly) | Advantage on perception while airborne

front.title: Wardstone
front.label: Front
front.body: Small stone etched with protective runes; glows when aberrations draw near.
front.footer: Attune | 10 charges | Spend 1 to gain +1 AC for one round

front.title: Field Rations
front.label: Front
front.body: Sealed packets that stay fresh for weeks; printed expiration helps alignment tests.
front.footer: Feeds one creature for a day | Waterproof packaging

back.title: Alignment Grid
back.label: Back
back.body: Light grid with center weight to ensure long-edge flips line up across the whole page.
back.footer: Verify every trim line crosses this grid.

back.title: Rune Motif
back.label: Back
back.body: Repeating rune to keep the reverse side consistent on all nine cards.
back.footer: Line art scaled to poker safe area.

back.title: Cut Proof
back.label: Back
back.body: Use this side to test duplex cuts before committing to thicker stock.
back.footer: Match dashed guides from the overlay.

back.title: Pocket Notes
back.label: Back
back.body: Space for handwriting on the reverse while keeping the front intact.

back.title: Tone Check
back.label: Back
back.body: Muted wash that will not bleed through standard cardstock.

back.title: Promo Face
back.label: Back
back.body: Include a generic crest for printing starter packs and samples.

back.title: QR Anchor
back.label: Back
back.body: Placeholder for scannable codes once source data is wired in.
back.footer: Keep codes inside the dashed safe zone.

back.title: Notebook Back
back.label: Back
back.body: Subtle dots keep handwriting aligned without overpowering the face art.

back.title: Logo Plate
back.label: Back
back.body: Centered Undercroft mark to match the Workbench visual language.
